segments.text: Excuse me , where is the Beijing Railway Station ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can take the subway to get there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will it take to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I take a bus or a taxi to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can take No . I bus or a taxi .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excuse me , sir . Where is the No . 1 bus stop ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please turn right at the traffic lights .
segments.speaker: S2
